unnormalised: Trying to explain the binomial theorem to my little bro... he's like "Why can't I just use (a+b)^2 = a^2 + b^2?". I'm like, bhai, LaTeX exists for a reason, and it's not just to make maths look fancy! (Try expanding (a+b)^7 by hand sometime...)
normalised: Trying to explain the binomial theorem to my little brother... he is like "Why cannot I just use parenthesis a plus b parenthesis squared equals a squared plus b squared?". I am like, brother, L-a-T-e-X exists for a reason, and it is not just to make maths look fancy! (Try expanding parenthesis a plus b parenthesis to the power of seven by hand sometime...)
